enchantment.gray.backfire.desc: Ignites the attacker when you are attacked.
enchantment.gray.boss_core_killer.desc:
Useful in area 8.
When the core of AetherFrenezio is revealed, %1$s the trident at the core inflicts a large amount of damage.
The power of the enchantment will %2$s after a successful use.
enchantment.gray.crab_claw.desc: Increases the distance you can break blocks.
enchantment.gray.creeper_discharger.desc:
Increases damage dealt to Creepers.
In addition, remove the charge of the target Creeper.
enchantment.gray.experience_pack.desc:
Has no effect.
Returns a lot of XP when disenchanted on grindstone.
enchantment.gray.extended_edge.desc: Increases the distance you can attack.
enchantment.gray.firework_infinity.desc: When charging the crossbow with a firework rocket, the firework rocket won't be consumed.
enchantment.gray.flame_burst.desc:
Increases damage dealt to mobs on fire.
The damage will slightly penetrate the armor of the target on fire.
◆ Not exclusive with other damage-increasing enchantments.
enchantment.gray.fragile.desc:
Reduces the %s effectiveness of the target.
Tip: Has good effect on spam-attack weapons
enchantment.gray.light_pollution.desc:
Triples damage dealt to mobs when:
1. the target has glowing effect, %s
2. both the target and the attacker are in light level 12 or higher.
enchantment.gray.midas_touch.desc: Turns the touched stone into gold.
enchantment.gray.ooze_bane.desc:
Increases damage dealt to Slimes.
Dispels oozing effect from targets.
enchantment.gray.rain_of_arrow.desc: Shoots 12 extra charged projectiles at a time.
enchantment.gray.sweeping_strength.desc: When hitting at least 4 targets with one attack, you will gain strength effect that lasts for seconds.
text.gray.revisit_enchantment_detail.lis: You have not found any enchantments in area 8 yet.
text.gray.revisit_enchantment:
Check Enchantment Details
Press %s to interact
I need the new cool potion_duration_scale component
item.gray.spawner_breaker.desc: Turn the first hit spawner into a glowstone
item.gray.torch_placer.desc.1: Places a torch at the hit position
item.gray.absorb_chestplate.desc.2: It devours everything including the owner's life
item.gray.necrocrystal.desc.1: Improved product of the one on the Wraithmail
item.gray.necrocrystal.desc.2: Although its power is weaker, it won't harm its owner
item.gray.necrocrystal.desc.3: Keeps removing one kind of negative effect from owner
item.gray.necrocrystal.desc.5: Changes the effect to be removed
item.gray.necrocrystal.desc.6: ◆ Hold %s to change to the previous effect
item.gray.air_blaster.desc.1: Spyglass doesn't shoot llama spit IRL
item.gray.air_blaster.desc.2: Shoots a concentrated blast of air,
item.gray.crystal_dagger.desc.1: Frost whispers in the air, ice shards dance,
item.gray.chaos_horn.desc.2: Applies %s to all nearby living creatures
item.gray.shield_horn.desc.1: Applies the effects to nearby players:
item.gray.emoji_mjolnir.desc: Sorry, this is not a real mace
item.gray.duck_pickaxe.desc.1: If it looks like an iron pickaxe and breaks blocks
item.gray.duck_pickaxe.desc.2: like an iron pickaxe, it must be an iron pickaxe
item.gray.null_sword.desc.2: If the attacked mob's health is full:
item.gray.sharp_bow.desc: Trivia: Sharpness works on ranged attack of bow
item.gray.enchantment_carrier.desc.1: Can be used in anvils to enchant items of the same type
item.gray.enchantment_carrier.desc.2: This item doesn't have normal functionality
item.gray.mutated_totem.desc.1: After death protection, doesn't grant any effect
item.gray.cactus_hat.desc.1: Immunes to cactus damage and thorns damage
item.gray.totem_refiller.desc.2: replenishes a totem from ender chest
item.gray.totem_refiller.desc.3: ◆ Only work if there are no more totems in hands
text.gray.totem_refiller.fail: There are no totems found in enderchest to replenish.
text.gray.totem_refiller.success_offhand: Replenished a totem of undying to off hand.
text.gray.totem_refiller.success_mainhan: Replenished a totem of undying to main hand.
item.gray.light_emitter.desc.1: Periodically inflicts 4 damage to nearby mobs
item.gray.light_emitter.desc.2: This damage triples to glowing mobs
item.gray.grimoire.desc.1: When placed in red-framed bookshelf, it can
item.gray.grimoire.desc.2: be summoned by %s and enchance them
item.gray.grimoire.effect.noop: Its power seems to have disappeared...
item.gray.grimoire.tip.self_destruct: Tip: Magus summoning this spell dies
item.gray.book.boq_nbt_comment.author: ᛒ the Wise
item.gray.book.boq_nbt_comment.page.1: As a guideline, if a sentence starts with "Wouldn't it be cool if we could set NBT on...", then it's probably not going to happen, simply because NBT is an awful interface for doing gameplay changes.
item.gray.book.boq_nbt_comment.page.2:
It is, however, decent data structure.
So stuff like storage operating on pure NBT is fine, but /loot ... storage is a very likely not happening, because items are not NBT.
item.gray.book.pack_mcmeta.author: Unknown
item.gray.book.js_trinity.author: Unknown
item.gray.book.rule_number_one.author: Davleek
item.gray.book.rule_number_one.page.1: Rabbits are cute animals and are not allowed to be eaten.
item.gray.book.right_click.author: Merak
item.gray.book.right_click.page.1:
Ancient Time
Carrot on a Stick

 Also known as COAS.
 Using this item can be detected by scoreboard stats.
item.gray.book.right_click.page.2:
1.16
Warped Fungus on a Stick

 The sibling of COAS. It's the same trick but this one attracts a rarer creature.
item.gray.book.right_click.page.3:
1.20.5
Food Component

 Anything could be edible in this version.
 Using & consuming the item can be detected by advancements, with component check to know what item is used.
 The downside is that it slows players down.
item.gray.book.right_click.page.4:
1.21.2
Consumable Component

 It's basically the same thing. Just the consumable behavior being saparated from food stats.
item.gray.book.right_click.page.5:
%s
Equippable Component

 In the new snapshot 25w06a, players got hidden saddle & body slots. This component suddenly becomes an option, as it no longer sacrifices an armor slot.
 Mojank please, don't remove the feature.
item.gray.book.gold_tutorial.author: Merak
item.gray.book.gold_tutorial.page.1:
This area is under the dominance of a powerful creature that lurks in the citadel.
 When mining golden blocks, no corresponding drops will appear.
item.gray.book.gold_tutorial.page.2:
The pile of gold in front of you is safe, so feel free to try it out.
 However, be cautious of other gold piles, as they may contain hidden dangers...
item.gray.book.boss_tutorial.author: Merak
item.gray.book.boss_tutorial.page.1:
%s has two health bars, the shell and the core.
 It is defeated when the core's health becomes 0.
 The wool box will appear after AetherFrenezio is defeated.
item.gray.book.boss_tutorial.page.2:
The core doesn't take any damage unless the shell's health is 0.
 In addition, the core is protected by four %s.
 Explore the citadel to break the energy sources!
item.gray.book.boss_tutorial.page.3:
After the core takes a certain amount of damage, the shell will fully recover.
 The lower the core's health, the higher resistance the shell has to projectiles.
item.gray.book.boss_tutorial.page.4:
%s
 You can retreat at any time.
 The boss battle doesn't reset when players leave or are defeated.
item.gray.book.boss_tutorial.page.5:
%s
 Take advantage of your tools and blocks.
 Gamemode is still survival during the boss fight.

text.gray.off_route_shulker_box.2: Reward: this shulker box, take it or leave it
text.gray.armor_erosion.head: Your helmet is eroded!
text.gray.armor_erosion.tooltip.title: Armor Erosion
text.gray.armor_erosion.tooltip:
Some mobs' attacks have a chance to erode %s armor.
The more eroded armor, the higher damage taken from these mobs.
text.gray.armor_erosion_forced: Your armor parts are eroded! [Overriding Erosion]
text.gray.armor_erosion_forced.tooltip:
An energy source near you eroded your armor.
Existing armor trims can be %s by erosion effect from the energy source.
The more eroded armor, the higher damage taken from some mobs.
text.gray.deeply_eroded_gold_hurt.toolti:
It hurts players who touch it and disables their armor for a while.
Tip: Those gold blocks are breakable
death.attack.gray.deeply_eroded_gold: %1$s was killed by Cursed Block of Gold
death.attack.gray.deeply_eroded_gold.pla: %1$s was killed by Cursed Block of Gold while fighting %2$s
text.gray.trapdoor_lock.unlocked_some: Tip: There is another lock somewhere!
text.gray.trapdoor_lock.unlocked_all: Tip: The trapdoor at the center of the laboratory opened!
